Google กำลังขโมยการเข้าชมของคุณหรือไม่? สัมภาษณ์กับ Alena Afanaseva, ผู้ก่อตั้งและ CEO ของ BeInCrypto

Is Google Stealing Your Traffic? An Interview with Alena Afanaseva, Founder and CEO of BeInCrypto 

17h ago//Iva Belamaric
general
AI

Summary

TH

ในการให้สัมภาษณ์ที่งาน Binance Blockchain Week Alena Afanaseva ซีอีโอของ BeInCrypto ได้เน้นย้ำว่าการสร้างสื่อที่ยั่งยืนต้องอาศัยความซื่อสัตย์สุจริตในระยะยาวมากกว่าการใช้กลโกงเพื่อผลกำไรระยะสั้น เธอมองว่าความมั่นคงในตลาด Crypto ที่ผันผวนนั้นมาจากค่านิยมที่แท้จริงและการไม่ยอมลดทอนคุณภาพของบทความเพื่อกำไรเฉพาะหน้า แม้ว่าคู่แข่งหลายรายจะไล่ล่ากระแส Hype ในช่วง Memecoin boom แต่ BeInCrypto กลับตัดสินใจปฏิเสธรายได้หลายล้านดอลลาร์จากโฆษณาคุณภาพต่ำเพื่อรักษาความไว้วางใจจากผู้อ่านและหลีกเลี่ยงการลงโทษจากอัลกอริทึม Afanaseva ยังได้พูดถึงผลกระทบจากการอัปเดตอัลกอริทึมของ Google และการเกิดขึ้นของ AI โดยระบุว่า AI เป็นเครื่องมือที่ช่วยเพิ่มประสิทธิภาพการทำงานไม่ใช่ตัวการแทนที่การดูแลของมนุษย์ เธอเชื่อว่าการปรากฏตัวในเครื่องมือค้นหาที่ใช้ AI อย่าง ChatGPT นั้นขึ้นอยู่กับการสร้างความน่าเชื่อถือและอำนาจความเชื่อมั่น (Authority) มากกว่าการส่งข่าวประชาสัมพันธ์จำนวนมาก สุดท้ายเธอย้ำว่าวัฒนธรรมองค์กรที่เน้นค่านิยมร่วมกันและการคิดเชิงวิเคราะห์เป็นสิ่งสำคัญต่อการอยู่รอดในวงการสื่อมวลชน Crypto ในระยะยาว

EN

In a podcast interview at Binance Blockchain Week, Alena Afanaseva, CEO of BeInCrypto, emphasized that sustainable media brands must prioritize long-term integrity over short-term growth hacks. She argued that stability in the volatile crypto market comes from authentic core values and refusing to compromise editorial quality for quick profits. While many competitors chased hype during the memecoin boom, BeInCrypto rejected millions of dollars in low-quality advertising to maintain audience trust and avoid algorithmic penalties. Afanaseva also addressed the impact of Google’s algorithm updates and the rise of AI, stating that AI is a tool to boost productivity rather than a replacement for human oversight. She believes that visibility in AI-powered search engines like ChatGPT depends on building authority and credibility rather than mass PR distribution. Ultimately, she highlighted that a company culture focused on shared values and analytical thinking is essential for long-term survival in the crypto media landscape.

Key Points

  • BeInCrypto prioritizes long-term integrity and editorial quality over short-term profits.
  • The company rejected millions in hype-driven ads (like memecoins) to maintain trust and avoid Google penalties.
  • AI is utilized as a supportive tool for research and drafting, maintaining human oversight for quality assurance.
  • Future visibility in AI search engines relies on authority and credible mentions rather than mass PR distribution.

Article

Building a brand isn’t always about profit. Sometimes, it’s about putting systems in place to make sure your content reaches its audience, even when Google threatens to take that traffic away. For BeInCrypto founder Alena Afanaseva, long-term thinking beats short-term hacks. In today’s fast-changing media landscape, sustainability comes from strategy. At BeInCrypto, that means staying committed to quality, credibility, and trust, even as algorithms shift. Speaking during a live podcast at Binance Blockchain Week, Alena shared insights on branding, media leadership, and the evolving relationship between AI, Google, and crypto journalism. Watch the full podcast interview here to hear Alena’s complete perspective. Sponsored Sponsored With 20+ years in finance, analytics, and digital media, she emphasized one key principle: Long-term integrity outweighs short-term growth hacks and that alone should be the defining factor for media survival today. Personal Branding Starts from the Core, Not Visibility Alena’s advice for founders is simple: start from the inside. Chasing virality or outsourcing your voice before understanding who you are rarely works. Authenticity is the foundation. Key takeaways: Identify your true strengths (public speaking, writing, analytical thinking) so your personal brand reflects what you genuinely excel at. Build your brand around those strengths to stay authentic. Work with professionals to amplify your voice, not replace it, keeping your brand true to you. “If there is something fake in between, it’s not going to work.” Visibility should follow the creation of something real, not precede it. Alena began in financial journalism and market analysis, publicly commenting on Bitcoin as early as 2014. Transitioning to crypto meant navigating uncharted territory: Sponsored Sponsored Early crypto markets were volatile, unstructured, and hype-driven. Traditional analysis methods didn’t apply. The ecosystem was narrow, mostly clustered with enthusiasts, hype, and heavy media influence. “Nothing worked for digital assets at that time,” Alena notes. Building BeInCrypto required creating a network from scratch and committing to disciplined, long-term strategies, even when short-term gains tempted others. Why BeInCrypto Stayed Stable While Others Lost Traffic Our platform focused on trust and insight, not just clicks, a philosophy that was put to the test during the memecoin boom. While many publishers chased hype and promoted low-quality projects, BeInCrypto: Limited press releases and reinforced internal editorial rules. Prioritized content quality, editorial integrity , and a clear separation between commercial interests and newsroom work. “We said no to millions of dollars because we realized it would kill the website long-term,” Alena explains. Sponsored Sponsored This long-term focus kept BeInCrypto stable while many crypto media outlets lost traffic chasing spikes or gaming SEO. Understanding the Google Shift Recent Google algorithm changes reinforced this strategy. According to Alena: Updates are frequent and unpredictable AI-generated content faces greater scrutiny Evergreen listicles and reviews are increasingly replaced by Google AI overviews. Mislabeling press releases, embedding affiliate links in editorial content, or lowering advertiser quality sends strong negative signals “AI isn’t the enemy; bad strategy is.” At BeInCrypto, AI accelerates research and drafting without compromising quality, boosting productivity while maintaining trust. Sponsored Sponsored AI as an Editorial Tool, Not a Threat Contrary to popular belief, AI isn’t killing the media. At BeInCrypto, AI tools: Support journalists with research and drafting Reduce cost per article Maintain human oversight to safeguard quality Visibility in ChatGPT and Other AI Tools Requires Trust As AI-powered search and discovery continues to grow, traditional PR tactics such as mass press release distribution, low-authority backlinks, and inflated media coverage no longer work. To be visible in ChatGPT or other LLMs, brands must focus on: Authority and credibility Trusted media mentions Consistent, high-quality content Long-term partnerships with reputable outlets One meaningful mention from a credible source now outweighs hundreds of low-quality placements. Founder Values Shape Company Culture With 150 people across 50+ countries, BeInCrypto emphasizes culture, structure, and shared values. Editorial decisions, hiring, and strategy all reflect analytical thinking, integrity, and sustainability. “If you build something for the long term, you need to be aligned with your core values and your DNA,” Alena emphasizes. Want to hear Alena’s full insights? Watch the full podcast interview here.
